ModInfo.Name: xce (ZH)
ModInfo.Author: Sheepy
ModInfo.Description:
Chinese (Traditional) Translation for Xenonauts Community Edition v0.34.2.
Includes all X:CE mods that are enabled by default.
This mod should be placed above the following translated mods:
Armoured Assault, Extended Weapon Descriptions for Fighters, Geographic addition 1.1, Lore+, X:CE Balance Adjustment, X:CE Base Mod
